description: Ms. codex. Title from beginning of text (fol. 3b, l. 9). 25 lines per page. Written in small naskh in black ink with use of red for headings and entries. Glazed European paper with atermark (Star, see fol. 5). Table of contents on fol. 1a-b. Fol. 156 blank. Fol. i-ii are added endleaves, with inscription in Arabic on fol. (ii)b. Title on the lower edge of the text block (illegible). Copy completed on Wednesday 23 Jumādá al-Ākhirah [10?]95 by Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Sanhūrī al-Shāmī (colophon, fol. 155a). Incipit: الحمد لله الذى رفع بعض خلقه على بعض درجات ... اما بعد فاننى لما فرغت من تهذيب تذميب الكمال فى اسما الرجال الذى جمعت فيه مقصود التهذيب لحافظ عصره ابى الحجاج المزّى Explicit: كانها ام عطية ام ولد عبد الرحمن بن عوف عزام سلمة لا تعرف من الثالثة والله اعلم اخر كتاب التقريب التقريب والحمد لله باطنا وظاهرا ... اصحاب رسول الله اجمعين قال مصنفه شيخ الاسلام خاتمة الحفاظ ... شهاب الدين احمد ابن حجر العسقلاني ... فرغ منه ... فى يوم الاربعا رابع عشرين جمادى الآخرة سنة سبع وعشرين وثماني ماية
author: Ibn Ḥajar al-ʻAsqalānī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī, 1372-1449
abstract: Abridgment of the author's Tahdhīb al-Tahdhīb, an abridgment of Tahdhīb al-kamāl fī maʻrifat al-rijāl, a summary by Jamāl al-Dīn Yūsuf ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Mizzī (d. 742/1341) of al-Kamāl fī maʻrifat al-rijāl by Taqī al-Dīn al-Jammāʻīlī (d. 600/1203). According to the end of this copy, the abridgment was completed on 24 Jumādá al-Ākhirah 827 [1424] (see fol. 155a). Leaves are missing in this copy, between fol. 4 and 5 (corresponds to fol. 3 and 15 in the Arabic foliation in black ink), between fol. 11 and 12 (fol. 22 and 30 in the Arabic foliation), between fol. 15 and 16 (fol. 32 and 34 in the Arabic foliation), etc.
extent: ii + 156 + ii leaves: paper ; 206 x 155 (160 x 100) mm. bound to 206 x 170 mm.
